name: Snake 2021 (autistmouse)
description:
This is a Godot based interpretation of the classic Snake game.

The object is to eat as many fruits as possible without running into a wall or your own tail.

Controls

WASD or arrow keys to direct your snake. You can also use the touch controls with your finger or mouse.

You may need to click on the game once after hitting run game in your browser.

This project was based on the excellent tutorial by Clear Code which you can try out yourself here:

I added some additional features such as a high score and lowres graphics.

I hope you enjoy it!
